insights.title: Walking after meals helps blood sugar
insights.summary: A short walk after eating can reduce blood sugar spikes and support digestion.

insights.title: The 10-minute walking rule
insights.summary: Even short walks done consistently can improve health and mood.

insights.title: How walking improves mental wellbeing
insights.summary: Walking regularly can reduce stress, anxiety, and improve sleep quality.

insights.title: Do you really need 10,000 steps?
insights.summary: Health benefits start well below 10,000 steps â€” consistency matters more.

insights.title: Walking and longevity
insights.summary: Regular walking is linked to longer life and lower risk of chronic disease.

insights.title: Why daily walking is easier to sustain
insights.summary: Walking is one of the most sustainable habits because it fits into daily life.
